interaction
Class TNTransformableObject

java.lang.Object
  interaction.TNTransformableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
TNObstacleObject, TNTuioTransformableObject
public class TNTransformableObject
extends java.lang.Object

Simple drawing object. Used instead of a map to solely check transformations.
